attributes.action: include capital gains tax as part of overall income, therefore taxing higher gains at appropriate levels of tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bankers, other city "types", BBC stars etc, they all use CGT to decrease their tax bill by large amounts so their effective tax rate is less than someone who earns 20K. If you include CGT in the total assessable tax ,and therefore tax at higher rates the higher incomes, everyone would benefit. The converse of a capital loss deceasing overall income would also apply, giving some benefit to those who have lost savings in the current finacial turmoil.
